mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM search_cache WHERE corp_name = #{corpName} AND cached_at >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -3)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO search_cache ( search_cache_idx, corp_name, col_name, col_value, cached_at ) VALUES ( SEARCH_CACHE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{corpName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{colName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{colValue, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSTIMESTAMP )
